dialogues.text:
HELLO THERE! I'M PIXEL, YOUR DIGITAL GUIDE TO THIS RETRO TERMINAL DIALOGUE SYSTEM!

*A tiny pixelated character dances on your screen*

I'LL SHOW YOU HOW EVERYTHING WORKS. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW FIRST?

responses.text: I'm ready to dive in! Skip the tutorial.

dialogues.text:
THIS IS A RETRO-STYLE TERMINAL DIALOGUE SYSTEM THAT SIMULATES THE GOOD OLD DAYS OF TEXT-BASED ADVENTURES!

*Pixel adjusts a tiny pair of glasses*

YOU'RE CURRENTLY LOOKING AT A DIALOGUE TREE - A SERIES OF CONNECTED CONVERSATIONS WITH BRANCHING PATHS BASED ON YOUR CHOICES.

THE GREEN-ON-BLACK AESTHETIC? TOTALLY AUTHENTIC TO 1980s COMPUTER TERMINALS!

responses.text: Thanks, let's go back to the main topics.

dialogues.text:
THIS SYSTEM HAS SOME PRETTY COOL FEATURES:

• BRANCHING DIALOGUES: YOUR CHOICES MATTER!
• QUEST SYSTEM: TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
• TYPEWRITER TEXT EFFECT: FOR THAT AUTHENTIC FEEL
• VARIABLE TRACKING: THE SYSTEM REMEMBERS YOUR CHOICES
• CONDITIONAL RESPONSES: SOME OPTIONS ONLY APPEAR BASED ON PREVIOUS CHOICES

*Pixel does a backflip, showing off*

WANT TO SEE ANY OF THESE IN ACTION?

THE TYPEWRITER EFFECT MAKES TEXT APPEAR CHARACTER BY CHARACTER, JUST LIKE OLD TERMINALS!

N O T I C E   H O W   T H I S   T E X T   A P P E A R S . . .

*Pixel mimics typing on a keyboard*

IT ADDS TO THE IMMERSION AND RETRO FEEL! THE SPEED CAN BE ADJUSTED IN SETTINGS.

I'VE NOTED YOUR PREFERENCE ABOUT THE TYPEWRITER EFFECT!

*Pixel taps at an invisible console*

SEE HOW THE SYSTEM REMEMBERED YOUR CHOICE? THAT'S VARIABLES IN ACTION!

VARIABLES ARE LIKE THE SYSTEM'S MEMORY!

FOR EXAMPLE, I KNOW THIS IS YOUR FIRST TIME MEETING ME BECAUSE I SET A VARIABLE WHEN YOU ARRIVED.

*Pixel pulls out a tiny digital notebook*

VARIABLES CAN TRACK THINGS LIKE:
• CHARACTERS YOU'VE MET
• CHOICES YOU'VE MADE
• ITEMS YOU'VE FOUND
• PLACES YOU'VE VISITED

responses.text: Can you show me an example?

dialogues.text:
HERE'S A LIVE EXAMPLE! I'LL CHECK IF YOU LIKED THE TYPEWRITER EFFECT...

*Pixel consults the digital notebook*

responses.text: I did say something about the typewriter effect!
I haven't said anything about the typewriter effect yet

dialogues.text:
SEE HOW THE SYSTEM ONLY SHOWED RESPONSE OPTIONS THAT MATCHED YOUR PREVIOUS CHOICES?

THAT'S THE POWER OF VARIABLES AND CONDITIONS! THEY MAKE DIALOGUES FEEL PERSONAL AND RESPONSIVE TO YOUR ACTIONS.

NAVIGATING DIALOGUES IS EASY!

*Pixel floats up and down*

YOU SIMPLY READ THE GREEN TEXT (THAT'S ME TALKING) AND THEN SELECT ONE OF THE RESPONSE OPTIONS BELOW.

EACH CHOICE LEADS TO A NEW PIECE OF DIALOGUE. SOMETIMES YOUR CHOICES WILL HAVE LASTING CONSEQUENCES!

responses.text: Let me try! Take me somewhere new.

dialogues.text:
YOU DID IT! YOU'VE NAVIGATED TO A NEW DIALOGUE NODE!

*Pixel claps enthusiastically*

SOMETIMES DIALOGUES CAN END (WITH NO MORE RESPONSES), LOOP BACK TO PREVIOUS POINTS, OR BRANCH INTO ENTIRELY NEW STORYLINES.

YOU CAN ALWAYS TELL WHERE YOU ARE BY LOOKING AT THE TEXT ABOVE THE RESPONSE OPTIONS.

AH, QUESTS! THE BACKBONE OF ANY GOOD ADVENTURE!

*Pixel strikes a heroic pose*

I'VE JUST STARTED YOU ON A TUTORIAL QUEST. CHECK YOUR QUEST LOG AND YOU'LL SEE IT!

QUESTS TRACK YOUR PROGRESS THROUGH STORIES AND GIVE YOU OBJECTIVES TO COMPLETE. THEY UPDATE AS YOU MAKE CERTAIN CHOICES OR REACH NEW AREAS.

responses.text: How do I complete this quest?
Interesting! Let's talk about something else.

dialogues.text:
TO COMPLETE THIS TUTORIAL QUEST, YOU NEED TO:

1. LEARN ABOUT VARIABLES (YOU MAY HAVE DONE THIS ALREADY)
2. TRY OUT NAVIGATION (ALSO POSSIBLY DONE)
3. FINISH THIS TUTORIAL

*Pixel checks items off on a tiny list*

AS YOU COMPLETE EACH STEP, YOUR QUEST LOG WILL UPDATE TO SHOW YOUR PROGRESS!

responses.text: I'm ready to finish the tutorial!
I want to explore more first

dialogues.text:
WELCOME BACK TO THE MAIN TOPICS! WHAT ELSE WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW ABOUT?

*Pixel spins in place, ready to help*

responses.text: I think I'm ready to finish the tutorial

dialogues.text:
WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW? I'M HERE TO HELP!

*Pixel pulls out a comically large magnifying glass*

responses.text: How can I create my own dialogues?

dialogues.text:
DIALOGUE FILES ARE STORED IN A SPECIAL FORMAT CALLED JSON!

*Pixel unfolds a digital blueprint*

EACH FILE CONTAINS:
• A STARTING POINT
• DIALOGUE NODES WITH TEXT AND OPTIONS
• QUEST DEFINITIONS
• VARIABLES AND THEIR DEFAULT VALUES

THE SYSTEM READS THESE FILES TO CREATE THE INTERACTIVE EXPERIENCE YOU'RE HAVING RIGHT NOW!

CREATING YOUR OWN DIALOGUES IS ABSOLUTELY POSSIBLE!

*Pixel wears a tiny creator's beret*

YOU CAN USE:
1. THE DIALOGUE EDITOR TOOL (STREAMLIT APP)
2. A TEXT EDITOR TO WRITE JSON DIRECTLY
3. CONVERT FROM OTHER FORMATS LIKE TWINE

THE EDITOR IS THE EASIEST OPTION - IT PROVIDES A USER-FRIENDLY INTERFACE FOR CREATING NODES, RESPONSES, AND QUESTS WITHOUT DEALING WITH RAW JSON!

responses.text: I'd like to try that sometime

dialogues.text:
THERE ARE SOME REALLY COOL ADVANCED FEATURES!

*Pixel puts on tiny sunglasses, looking very cool*

• CONDITIONAL RESPONSES: Show options only under certain conditions
• SCRIPT COMMANDS: Trigger events when certain options are selected
• VARIABLE TRACKING: Remember player choices and state
• QUEST STAGES: Track progress through multi-step objectives
• CLI MODE: Run dialogues from the command line

THESE FEATURES ALLOW FOR COMPLEX, RESPONSIVE NARRATIVES!

NO PROBLEM! I RESPECT A GO-GETTER ATTITUDE.

*Pixel salutes you*

JUST REMEMBER:
- SELECT OPTIONS TO NAVIGATE DIALOGUES
- CHECK YOUR QUEST LOG FOR OBJECTIVES
- HAVE FUN EXPLORING!

YOU CAN ALWAYS COME BACK TO ME IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS.

responses.text: Actually, I changed my mind. Show me the tutorial.

dialogues.text:
CONGRATULATIONS! YOU'VE COMPLETED THE TUTORIAL!

*Pixel throws digital confetti in the air*

YOU NOW KNOW THE BASICS OF:
• NAVIGATING DIALOGUES
• UNDERSTANDING THE QUEST SYSTEM
• HOW VARIABLES WORK
• THE OVERALL STRUCTURE OF THE SYSTEM

YOU'RE READY TO EXPLORE MORE COMPLEX DIALOGUES AND STORIES!

responses.text: I'd like to start over and review some things

dialogues.text:
YOU'RE VERY WELCOME! IT'S BEEN MY PLEASURE GUIDING YOU THROUGH THIS SYSTEM.

*Pixel bows with a flourish*

REMEMBER, I'M ALWAYS HERE IF YOU NEED A REFRESHER OR HAVE MORE QUESTIONS LATER ON.

ENJOY YOUR ADVENTURES IN THE RETRO TERMINAL WORLD!
